text: ye log tumhaare paravaradigaar kee rahamat ko (apane taur par) baantate hain hamane to inake daramiyaan unakee rozee dunayaavee zindagee mein baant hee dee hai aur ek ke doosare par darje buland kie hain taaki inamen ka ek doosare se khidamat le aur jo maal (mata) ye log jama karate phirate hain khuda kee rahamat (paigambar) isase kaheen behatar hai
